description: Try our easy to follow Muesli & Honey Treats recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Muesli & Honey Treats Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper. Process dates and 2 tbs boiling water in a food processor until it forms a paste. Add tahini and coconut oil and process until smooth.
Combine remaining ingredients in a large bowl. Add date pur√©e and mix together until combined.

Roll mixture into balls and place on prepared tray. Chill for 30 minutes or until firm. Tip 1: These can be stored in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 2 weeks. Tip 2: If your school has a nutfree policy, omit the almonds from this recipe, or keep the treats as a quick, after-school snack only.
